product_name: REI AirRail 1.5 Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad - Women's
long_description: The Women's REI AirRail 1.5 Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad features a hybrid design that offers low weight, compressibility and ample sleeping comfort. Hybrid design combines an insulated-foam center panel with large air tubes outside to keep you from rolling off; outer tubes are insulated with PrimaLoft(R) microfiber fill. Women-specific design has increased insulation in torso area-a key heat-loss area for women-and extra padding in hip area. Cross-cored foam insulation is lightweight, compressible and stable. Quick-closing, high-flow valves. Durable 75-denier polyester top has an embossed nonslip surface; 75-denier polyester bottom resists wear; all seams are welded. Tapered mummy shape reduces weight and packed size. R-value equals 4.2; most sleeping pads REI sells range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (highly insulated). The Women's REI AirRail 1.5 Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack.
short_description: The Women's REI AirRail 1.5 Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad features a hybrid design that offers low weight, compressibility and ample sleeping comfort.
